reviewText:
I had to import to UK and the DVD weren't multi region but I enjoyed the documentary and it was a good promotional tool for the album.
Jim Jones fans will love it.

This is Jim Jones documentary is a well documented film about the rise and fall of rapper Jim Jones.
From the moment that I saw the trailer on the internet I knew I had to have a copy. From their split
with Dipset to getting signed by Damon Dash @ RocaFella, it's all in there. A must see if you ask me.

This is an ok movie i would get "A day in the Fastlife" instead of this ...But i saw most of the DVD on youtube on Jim Jones channel but i wish it coulda been longer thou .....But anyway its good ..if u have sum money layin around i would get this just to add to your collection
